entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove lookup of JsonTypeMapping via JsonElement #32192
  • ModificationCommand.HandleJson hard-coded to send parameter with relational NULL for non-property partial update #32191
  • Improve AssertSql for non-query tests #32190
  • UpdateSqlGenerator.AppendUpdateColumnValue needs to throw for unimplemented JSON partial update #32186
  • Change partial update JSON path to be be structured instead of a string JSONPATH #32185
  • BUG: AccessViolationException using where expression on decimal in .Net 6, x86 target, Sqlite #32180

Closed

  • Nullable object must have a value error when I try to proyect a nullable navigation property #32181

PullRequests

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.12 to 7.0.13 #32189
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.4 to 3.36.0 #32188
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.1 to 5.1.2 #32187
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [Component governance] Update Azure.Identity dependency #32108
    blocked
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.58.0 #32140
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
